Plaque buildup can lead to cavities, gum disease, and even tooth loss.1 So, here’s what you need to do.

Trustpilot

“This device is AMAZING! I have very tight gaps between my teeth that are really hard to clean. FlossyFresh took care of them in a matter of seconds!”

Surely everyone had food stubbornly stuck in their teeth, that no matter what you do, it won’t budge.

And a lot of people struggle to properly remove plaque buildup from their teeth.

Many people experience bleeding gums when they floss.

Maintaining a healthy smile is a complicated and sometimes painful process. It starts at home in your own bathroom, but if you fail, it can lead to a dentist’s office.

Brushing your teeth with toothpaste and a toothbrush at least twice a day is essential. But it only cleans 70% of the teeth.2 To clean the rest, you need to floss.

Flossing is essential, and there is no way around it. However, so many people skip this step!

And we all know why.

It’s inconvenient. It’s a long and dirty process. It’s painful. It sometimes makes your mouth bleed.

But if you skip this part of your dental care routine too much, you might face even more inconvenient and painful problems.

The plaque buildup you don’t properly clean can cause bad breath, destroy tooth enamel, lead to cavities and gum disease, and can even result in tooth loss3

Thankfully, there’s no need to let it go so far. And you don’t have to bother with the annoying flossing strings either!

Change your dental care routine with a water flosser!

The new oral irrigator FlossyFresh uses a powerful water stream that could access the tiniest gaps and furthest corners of your mouth to effectively push out the food particles and potentially remove soft plaque.

Thanks to FlossyFresh, you can finally floss comfortably, quickly, and painlessly!

What is it?

FlossyFresh is a portable oral irrigator (aka water flosser) for at-home, everyday use.

It is probably the best tool for an effective and painless dental care routine.

It equips a high-pressure water flow to effectively remove bits of food, plaque, and bacteria buildup from under the gumline and between the teeth.

It is suitable for everyone, from people with periodontic problems to people with braces! The different water flow intensities and special nozzles can be matched to accommodate any needs.

How does it work?

Using FlossyFresh is super straightforward.

  1. Firstly, you have to fill up the tank with water or mouthwash—simply unscrew the bottom of the device, fill it up, and screw it back on.
  2. Then, pick the attachment of your choosing: classic for regular flossing, special tongue cleaner, periodontic nozzle for gumline and gum pockets, or orthodontic attachment to clean braces and other dental appliances.
  3. After that, you just need to turn on the flosser, choose the intensity mode, and let FlossyFresh do its job!

And what you are sure to love about FlossyFresh is its compact size and cordless design!

For maximum convenience, this device has a built-in rechargeable battery, and it’s the size of a water bottle, so you can easily take your flosser on trips. There is no need to miss a single day of your perfect oral hygiene routine!

Who can use FlossyFresh?

FlossyFresh is becoming really popular, especially among people who experience difficulties with the traditional way of flossing. But that doesn’t mean you can't opt for water flossing if you’re not experiencing any problems.

Anybody can use FlossyFresh!

This handy device will be most appreciated by people with braces or other orthodontic appliances. Special nozzle and water stream gently clean around the appliances. It is a great alternative for people who cannot use string floss.

Another group that could benefit significantly from this device is people with dentures and implants. The microscopic gaps between the gumline and the artificial teeth are tough to access, so gentle water jets can help when cleaning them.

People with sensitive gums will also appreciate this water flosser. It can flush out food particles from between the teeth without hurting the gums. In fact, it massages the gums and can help keep them healthy!

Don’t forget the smallest ones! Children aren’t always able to clean their little teeth properly. And introducing water flossing from a young age can really help build healthy dental care habits. (Of course, children should always be supervised while using the oral irrigator.)

But honestly, FlossyFresh is perfect for literally anyone who wants to quit traditional flossing and level up their oral hygiene routine!

String Floss

Can be painful

Sometimes makes the gums bleed

Cleans only 2-3mm below the gumline

Gets stuck between closely spaced teeth

Requires good hand mobility to use

Difficult to use for people with dental appliances

Single-use, non-recyclable

FlossyFresh

Gentle

Massages the gums

Cleans periodontal pockets as deep as 7mm

Nothing is inserted between the teeth

Can be used by people with limited hand mobility

Has a special orthodontic cleaning nozzle

Reusable

You will definitely love the results, just like hundreds of people around the world!
